about_the_game:
Under the lonely moonlight, let's play chess by playing cards!
The hollow moon casts mottled shadows
Please note whether your chess pieces are under the shadow of the moon. If not, you will be punished!
Has the unique expense system filled your strategy?
Is it offensive or defensive, is it a slap or a solution?
What, the moon can still rotate?
Your choice determines the fate of the chessmen and lays your end
'Lonely Me' is a TCG game
But compared with traditional TCG card games
'Lonely Me' borrows the inspiration brought by chess
It is a good combination of grid and movement in chess
After adding the concept of mobile
The plane becomes three-dimensional
Compared with the traditional TCG cards, 'Lonely Me' has become more abundant and strategic
Although mobile is added, it is still a card game in essence
Concepts such as matchmaking in traditional TCG games are still reserved in 'Lonely Me'
Its movement mode is obviously different from that of war chess. Card players can quickly and skillfully play
In addition, the movement of 'Lonely Me' is not simple
We added the concept of the moon in the game, but the moon is incomplete
Your chess pieces can only walk in the shadow, and you can rotate the moon in the round
This will enrich the game points of both sides in the round
At the same time, we have designed many simple but interesting skills around this mechanism
Make the battle more interesting
In order to control the rhythm of the game, we hope that Moonlight Moonlight is a faster game in a single game
So we reduced the HP of both players
And designed a unique cost system
To make every chess piece have a chance to play even in a very fast match
Come to experience a new and creative card game in 'Lonely Me'!
